channel.title: Get your server hosted on a dedi
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape Members I have just purchased a dedicated server but i dont have enough time to code a full blown server. So i'm offering one lucky coder a chance to have there server hosted on a dedicated server.
The server must be - Full Silabsoft Special attacks Fun IPBan & Ban.
Post server information here.
Please dont post here saying "He's going to take your server" & Such. I'll show proof that i have the server. I just want to have administrator status on a server & help a coder out. This is out of respect not scamming.
I have reputation for not scamming. Im known on alot of forums such as Talkgeek [2000+ Posts] & Rscheata [200+ Posts] & I dont want to take the server.
Proof i have the server - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/1161/server2kh3.jpg[/img][/URL] The server is ran by Windows Server 2003 RC. This is the best server operating system for people that like to host Private Servers.
The server will be hosted 24/7
The Catch - I get level 3 administrator status. I can edit the code at anytime. You'll still be crowned owner. I'll also make a forum for the people to speak on.

ill do it.

Read full topic
